# ifastDummies

This package improves the `fastDummies` package (you can check out their original package [here](https://github.com/jacobkap/fastDummies/)) by a tiny but -- to me -- significant feature. Using the `sep` argument, you can now directly specify how column names and unique values should be separated.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ifastDummies from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Solaire-patch/ifastDummies")
```

## Example

```{r}
library(ifastDummies)

df <- data.frame(city = c("SF", "SF", "NYC"),
                 year = c(1990, 2000, 1990),
                 crime = 1:3)


i_dummy_cols(df, sep = "_-_")
```
